title: 11 Best Bedside Lamps & Table Lamps of 2025
description: We've got some very bright ideas for your next home upgradeüí°
author: Audrey Lee, Erika Owen
byline: Audrey Lee, Erika Owen, Lizzie Soufleris
excerpt: The best bedside lamps add light and life to your rooms. Discover 21 of our favorite table lamps, including classic, contemporary, and modern picks!
text: (Lamps pictured with a 2.4-ounce candle for size comparison)Our Top PicksBest Mid-Century Table Lamp: Article Moon Gold Table Lamp, $149 from ArticleBest Statement Lamp: Urban Outfitters Strawberry Table Lamp, $64 from Urban OutfittersBest Coastal Chic Lamp: Serena & Lily Como Petite Table Lamp, $298 from Serena & LilyBest Glass Lamp: West Elm Ribbed Glass Table Lamp, $99 from West ElmBest Portable Lamp: Flowerpot V9 Rechargeable LED Table Lamp, $315 from AnthropologieBest Small Lamp: Pottery Barn Fallon Forged Iron Table Lamp, $249 Pottery BarnBest Rechargeable Lamp: Flos Bellhop Rechargeable Table Lamp, $319 from DWRBest Cottagecore Lamp: Lulu & Georgia Jordan Table Lamp, $198 from Lulu & GeorgiaBest Shape: McGee & Co. Vedruna Table Lamp, $349 from McGee & Co.Best Fabric Lamp: Scrunch Black and White Table Lamp by Kara Mann, $179 from CB2Best Task Lamp: Analog Task Lamp, $248 from GantriBest Mid-Century Table Lamp: Article Moon Gold Table LampArticle Moon Gold Table LampThis pick boasts the brightness of a larger lamp but in a small package. Despite its oversized bulb, this lamp has a small footprint‚Äîperfect for a nightstand that could use some elegance. The base is made of a brushed metal and it has a fabric-wrapped cord, providing the perfect anchor for the frosted glass shade. Contributor Andrea Lewis particularly loved the ‚Äúseamless‚Äù assembly process as well as the ‚Äúsimple, petite, and versatile‚Äù midcentury-modern design. ‚ÄúThe Moon Gold table lamp from Article has become a staple in my bedroom‚Äîits misted glass shade casts a prominent warm light that‚Äôs perfect for reading,‚Äù she says. ‚ÄúWhether you place it on a study desk, beside your bed, or in your living room, this small but powerful lamp radiates generously.‚ÄùDimensions: 11" Height x 6" DiameterMaterials: Steel, glass, plastic, textile cordColors: GoldPower source: Plug-inBulb type: E26 4W LED, accommodates 25W max recommendedLight bulb included? YesAny dust build up will be slightly more noticeable with this design, so you may have to be diligent in keeping the glass surface wiped clean.Best Statement Lamp:Urban Outfitters Orange Table Lamp(Editor's Note: While the orange lamp Lizzie tested is no longer available, we recommend the equally charming strawberry version as a close substitute).Urban Outfitters Orange Table LampThe switch for this fruity lamp is found on the cord. This juicy lamp reminds us of the brightly colored hard candy you might find at the bottom of your grandma‚Äôs purse. With a playful produce-inspired design that can be set on a base or hung from the ceiling, this charming piece is sure to draw oohs and ahhs from anyone who loves decor you can sink your teeth into.Dimensions: 8.7" Height x 8.7" DiaemeterMaterials: Glass, polyresin, fabric cord, ironColors: OrangePower source: Plug-in, in-line on/off switchBulb type: E12 Standard Base 7W Bulb recommendedLight bulb included? NoAccording to Urban Outfitters, this lamp can be used in two ways: perched on its ring-shaped base (as pictured) or hung as a pendant. While the latter is doable on a functional level, it looks pretty bizarre when suspended from the ceiling, as the faux leaves point straight down.Best Coastal Chic Lamp: Serena & Lily Como Petite Table LampSerena & Lily Como Petite Table LampA built-in dimmer switch allows you to customize the glow. Looking for some living room table lighting with a touch of coastal grandma style? Look no further than this rattan lamp from Serena and Lily. With its petite size, the light can fill up empty nooks and crannies while perfectly illuminating them. ‚ÄúWhat immediately caught my eye was how the unique, trendy raffia shade complements the sleek ceramic base beautifully,‚Äù associate visuals editor Shani Kravetz told us. ‚ÄúThe lamp is the perfect size for a desk or kitchen counter, adding a warm, ambient glow and delightful pop of style.‚ÄùDimensions: 13.25" Height x 8.25" DiameterMaterials: Ceramic base, hand-glazed with brass hardware; shades in raffia or linenColors: Base: white, coastal blue, sage, dark honey; Shade: white or raffia (in plain taper, fringe, or scalloped finishes)Power source: Plug-inBulb type: E26 Type A15 medium base bulb (60W max) recommendedLight bulb included? NoThe switch requires a substantial turn to activate and may not be the best choice for illuminating a full workspace. If the Raffia Wave shade isn‚Äôt your style, there‚Äôs three other shade options available, along with a range of colored bases.Best Glass Lamp: West Elm Ribbed Glass Table LampWest Elm Ribbed Glass Table LampThis lamp comes in three different sizes. We tested the 9" version. This design-forward white table lamp (which is inspired by a Japanese lantern) has us doing a double take thanks to its silhouette and subtle texture. According to commerce editor Audrey Lee, ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs something about this little lamp that‚Äôs incredibly soothing.‚Äù With a glass shape that doesn‚Äôt scream ‚Äúlight fixture,‚Äù it‚Äôs the perfect way to add pizzazz to any nightstand or dimly lit corner, especially if you prefer contemporary or postmodern design aesthetics. ‚ÄúThis West Elm light emits a subtle glow in such a beautiful way, and I love that the ribbed design doesn‚Äôt disappear when it‚Äôs turned on,‚Äù says Audrey. ‚ÄúI like to have just this on if I‚Äôm about to turn in for the night but want to watch a show or two to help lull me to sleep‚Äîit‚Äôs just perfect.‚ÄùDimensions: 9" Height x 7.75" Diameter; 13.4" Height x 10" Diameter; 18" Height x 13.5" DiameterMaterials: Glass, PVC cordColors: Champagne, amberPower source: Plug-in, in-line on/off switchBulb type: 60W incandescent bulb or LED equivalent recommended, 9" size has E12 bulb socket; 13" and 18" sizes have E26 bulb socket.Light bulb included? NoWhile it‚Äôs definitely not dim, this lamp might be best served as a mood lighting moment rather than a solid light source you‚Äôd want for reading or working.Best Portable Lamp: &Tradition Flowerpot V9 Rechargeable LED Table LampFlowerpot V9 Rechargeable LED Table LampChoose your brightness with this lamp's three touch-activated levels. Not only is the Flowerpot Lamp, designed by Verner Panton, a modern design staple‚Äìit‚Äôs also a portable lamp with endless versatility. Need a little more light during transitional hours? How about an extra glow for your outdoor dining table? Commerce director Rachel Fletcher called the petite light source ‚ÄúBy far one of the cutest things I own.‚Äù Great for emitting ‚Äúa soft, romantic light,‚Äù Rachel loves that it can easily live at her desk or tag along to a backyard hang thanks to the portable design. ‚ÄúI have the bright forest green, which gives me frog on a lily pad vibes every time I look at it, and it comes in lots of other shades including more subdued earth tones and metallics.‚Äù And if you love the look but want something more substantial, it is also available in a pendant style as well as a larger, plugged in version (seen here in podcaster Karen Kilgariff's LA office).Dimensions: 11.5" Height x 9" DiameterMaterials: Polycarbonate, steelColors: Swim blue, cobalt blue, stone blue, tangy pink, vermillion red, dark plum, mustard, signal green, matte black, matte white, matte light grey, grey beige, brass-plated, chrome-platedPower source: Rechargeable battery, micro USB charging cableBulb type: 3W LED built-in bulbLight bulb included? YesThis lamp, compared to the portable Bellhop, doesn't have a very long charge (the Flowerpot is said to last 10 hours while the Bellhop estimates 24). It also requires its own charging cord (included) that has to be angled just so, as it's hidden under the base of the lamp, which seems like a slightly annoying design feature.Best Small Lamp: Pottery Barn Fallon Forged Iron Table LampPottery Barn Fallon Forged Iron Table LampThis lamp is one of the tallest we tested, but still has a fairly small footprint. The rustic iron base and clean white shade makes this Pottery Barn lamp perfect for anyone looking to build a modern space that‚Äôs classic, simple, and vintage-inspired. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs slim enough that it won‚Äôt overwhelm wherever you‚Äôll put it,‚Äù notes Audrey. ‚ÄúYou kind of get the best of both worlds with this little lamp: The textured base gives the piece an unfinished look, but the crisp, linen shade makes it feel pristine and less harsh.‚Äù Easy to style in your office, bedroom, living room, or kitchen, we think this is an especially versatile option if you‚Äôre looking to buy the same lamp to have in multiple areas of your home.Dimensions: 22" Height x 8" Diameter; 31.5" Height x 10" DiameterMaterials: Forged rustic iron and aluminum, linen shadeColors: BronzePower source: Plug-in, on socket on/off switchBulb type: 75W type A standard bulb or LED equivalent recommendedLight bulb included? NoAssembly is minimal but don‚Äôt be afraid to put in some muscle when you‚Äôre trying to lock the shade holder onto the lamp base. You‚Äôll also want to avoid any super abrasive cleaning products to protect the metal finish.Best Rechargeable Lamp: Flos Bellhop Rechargeable LED Table LampFlos Bellhop Rechargeable LED Table LampA button controls this lamp's four-step dimmer. If you have an outdoor space, you know the importance of having a cordless lamp you can tote on the short journey inside to grab more drinks or snacks once the sun has gone down. Or maybe you want to guide guests to the backyard for a little midnight gossip session around the fire pit. Whatever it is, this rechargeable lamp is easy to grab and is available in a plethora of colors. With a ‚Äúvaguely mushroomy‚Äù look according to Rachel, its small stature and four dimmable light levels makes it endlessly versatile. ‚ÄúI've seen them featured in Hypebeast homes, minimalist Barcelona bedrooms, tiny Sydney apartments, and grand Austin estates, so chances are it'll work for whatever design scheme resonates with you,‚Äù says Rachel. ‚ÄúThe last note I'd make is that the price point is quite steep at over $300 for such a tiny piece. While there are lots of dupes on the market, I'd definitely stick with the original as it's been through the ringer with me for the last two years.‚ÄùDimensions: 8.375" Height x 5" DiameterMaterials: PolycarbonateColors: Burnt orange, dark brown, grey, grey blue, white, yellow, matte blackPower source: Rechargeable battery, USB charging cableBulb type: Rechargeable LED bulbLight bulb included? YesIf you're looking for a super bright desk or task lamp, this is not it! I'd also opt for a non matte option in the future because the black shows all the imperfections which, because I tote it around a lot, there are many bumps and bruises.Best Cottagecore Lamp: Lulu & Georgia Jordan Table Lamp(Editor's Note: The petite version of this lamp is currently being restocked with a preorder option. We recommend the Jordan Floor Lamp from the same collection as a substitute.)Lulu & Georgia Jordan Table LampThe pleated shade on this lamp feels both vintage and modern. This updated take on a vintage silhouette from Lulu & Georgia is sure to steal the show. ‚ÄúThe Jordan is the Goldilocks of table lamps‚Äînot too dim, not too bright‚Ä¶just right,‚Äù says AD Pro associate director Lila Allen.‚Äù Describing it as ‚Äúa wee bit on the smaller side,‚Äù Lila found a perfect place for the piece on her nightstand. ‚ÄúIts ruffled, patterned fabric and wavy shade mean it fits well into a cottagecore scheme, if that‚Äôs your thing, but its metallic sheen on the base gives it a little edge and allows it to blend into more eclectic interiors too.‚Äù With a corded toggle switch that makes it easy to switch on and off there‚Äôs no need to crank your arm into the interior of the shade.Dimensions: 13.75" Height x 13.1" DiameterMaterials: Steel, linen shadeColors: Antique brassPower source: Plug-in, in-line on/off switchBulb type: E12 40W bulb recommendedLight bulb included? NoBuyers should be aware that this lamp requires an E12-base bulb (I couldn‚Äôt find one at my local hardware store, but Amazon had plenty). Cleaning is a mixed bag: The base can be wiped with a cloth, but the fabric shade might take a bit more care. If your home tends to collect dust, a lint roller should do the job.Best Shape: McGee & Co. Vedruna Table LampMcGee & Co. Vedruna Table LampIf the orange lamp wasn't your style, this ode to an avocado is sure to delight. Interiors guru Shea McGee brings her signature touch to this quirky table lamp. ‚ÄúMultiple friends and passersby have noted how much the base looks like a design-forward avocado,‚Äù Audrey remarks. ‚ÄúI think this lamp could really work in pretty much any space, from more reserved interiors to design schemes that lean more eclectic.‚Äù The sculptural base of this decorative light is topped with a neutral white linen shade for a striking contrast that keeps things feeling coastal chic in a contemporary way. For this lamp, you‚Äôll want to keep it looking pristine with a dry cloth to wipe away dust and smudges, avoiding harsh cleaners that might damage the finish.Dimensions: 13" Height x 9" DiameterMaterials: Ceramic earthenware, metal, fabric shadeColors: BrownPower source: Plug-inBulb type: E26 type A 90 / 9 LED bulb recommendedLight bulb included? YesThe base of the lamp is a bit on the heavy side so you may want to take the necessary precautions to ensure it doesn‚Äôt tip over.Best Fabric Lamp: Scrunch Table Lamp by Kara MannScrunch Table Lamp by Kara MannMaximalists rejoice! The print on this lamp extends from the base through the shade. Another of the best bedside lamps (or side table lamps, for that matter) is this fabric-covered CB2 find with a unique scrunched shade and all-over abstract print. ‚ÄúI was immediately enamored with the allover squiggle motif because it makes it feel more like an art piece than just a lamp to me,‚Äù says commerce producer Lauren Arzbaecher. ‚ÄúThe black fabric slightly dampens the brightness it gives off, but the completely open top to the shade evens it out for an amount of light perfect for a nightstand.‚Äù Anyone interested in this number will also appreciate that the lamp is durably made in Lauren‚Äôs experience. ‚ÄúMy sleepy self is not always careful when I reach out to turn on the light after waking up, so I was a little worried about the tall and fairly skinny base because I‚Äôve had tipping issues before with lamps that have a similar shape. Thankfully, that hasn‚Äôt been an issue with this one, as the base is weighted enough to keep it stable.‚ÄùDimensions: 23" Height x 13" DiameterMaterials: Iron, cotton fabricColors: Black and white, ivory and goldPower source: Plug-inBulb type: 9W max type A LED bulb or 60W max type A incandescent bulb recommendedLight bulb included? NoBeing fully wrapped in fabric, dust tends to cling to this lamp a bit more than others, particularly to the shade due to the pleats. It‚Äôs easy enough to wipe away with a soft cloth though, and I was pleasantly surprised how the pleats stood up to cleaning.Best Task Lamp: Gantri Analog Task LightGantri Analog Task LightThe adjustable top on this geometric lamp allows you to direct the light wherever you need it. Consider the Gantri Analog Task Lamp two-faced: It can set a mood and get down to work when it needs to. If there ever was a lamp that looked like it was going to sprout legs and march right off the table, this is it. There are three colors to choose from (stone, carbon, and persimmon), and the light switch has dimming capabilities. Visuals editor Lizzie Soufleris describes the piece as ‚Äúa perfect desk lamp,‚Äù thanks to the dimmable light that can rotate a full 230 degrees in either direction. ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt let the oversized Rubik‚Äôs cube‚Äìesque look fool you‚Äìthis lamp is highly functional,‚Äù she adds. ‚ÄúPlus, the exterior is made of GPP, Gantri‚Äôs sustainably sourced sugarcane polymer blend.‚ÄùDimensions: 16"H x 4"W x 8"DMaterials: Polymers derived from non-GMO sugarcaneColors: Stone, carbon, and persimmonPower source: Plug-in, in-line on/off switchBulb type: E12 LED dimmable bulb recommendedLight bulb included? YesIf you plan to place a lamp several feet from the nearest outlet, look no further; the Analog has a looooong cord. While I love that kind of flexibility, the excess is a bit bulky and difficult to tuck away neatly. It‚Äôs not a deal breaker by any means, but cable-management-heads may want to invest in some extra large cord clips to keep everything tidy.More Lamps We RecommendAnthropologie Simone Task LampThe Simone task lamp takes an already distinct style and elevates it even more with an interesting shade and curvaceous silhouette. It features a brushed gold base and not one, but two stylish lamp colors‚Äîburgundy and mint green. Plus, the oversized bulb peaking out from inside the shade really steals the show (not to mention it‚Äôll add an even brighter glow). Bulb type: E12 shape T8 bulb recommended Light bulb included? Yes Cozy Table LampIf you‚Äôre shooting for a modern take on a lantern-style lamp, then this handmade design from Etsy is for you. Not exceedingly bright but alluringly ambient, it‚Äôs a perfect option if you‚Äôre looking to incorporate more mood lighting into your space. Available in three sizes and four plug options for international buyers, we‚Äôre especially fond of how the textured shade diffuses light. Bulb type: E12 shape T8 bulb recommended Light bulb included? Yes Crate & Barrel Formosa Stone Table LampHere‚Äôs a lamp that doubles as art. This stately, squat piece is made from a solid marble base and a burnished brass and stainless steel shade. It'll look handsome on a nightstand or side table. Bulb type: G9 5W LED bulb Light bulb included? No Schoolhouse Teig LampThis little task lamp is such a cutie we had to include it. The petite pick is perfect for small surfaces that larger lamps could overwhelm. Pop one onto your accent table or end table and it will give you fantastic light without taking up a lot of room. Shop the lamp in ash, alder green, and industrial yellow (pictured). Bulb type: Dimmable G16 clear LED bulb recommended Light bulb included? Yes Wade Logan Carrizalez Ceramic Table LampIf your shelves are already full of ceramic vessels, sneak a little light in disguise into the scene. The linen shade and ceramic body offer a beautiful textural juxtaposition, and we love the classic jug silhouette. It‚Äôs all made a little more modern with small handles circling the top. Bulb type: Standard A19, E26 base bulb (max 100W) recommended Light bulb included? No West Elm Kids Rocky Table LampHere‚Äôs a secret: There are some seriously fun lighting options hiding on the pages of West Elm Kids. This cobalt blue beauty is no exception. We love how the base is designed to act as a little tray, as well. Bulb type: LED bulb recommended Light bulb included? Yes Joss & Main Ceramic Table LampHear us out: Sometimes you need a lamp, but you don‚Äôt necessarily want to blast the room with a ton of light. It may sound counterintuitive, but the art of mood lighting is complicated‚Äîand very important. This monochrome table lamp has a striking silhouette that will make a statement no matter where you put it. Bulb type: Type A19 E26 60W bulb recommended Light bulb included? No HAY Neon Tube LED LightNeon and bright LED strip lights are having a moment, and for the most part, the trend is a little tacky. But there are ways to do it right. Case in point: This tube light from Hay, which can be propped in an unassuming corner to add a pop of brightness to the space. It comes in a handful of colors‚Äîgrab a few and create your own fixture. Bulb type: 12W LED Light bulb included? Yes Yarra-Decor Dimmable Lamp With USB PortThis Amazon bestseller is one of the most popular products purchased by our readers in 2021. It turns on simply by tapping the base, is dimmable, and has a USB port. It comes in more than eight colors (including teal, pink, blue, black, and gray). An LED¬†light bulb is even included with your purchase, so you‚Äôll be ready to go as soon as it arrives! Bulb type: E26 60W LED bulb recommended Light bulb included? Yes IKEA FADO Table LampDon‚Äôt sleep on IKEA‚Äôs newer collections. The spherical FADO lamp has taken over TikTok because of its versatility with a number of different interior design styles. Our favorite tip? Use a smart lightbulb to change the color (say, pink or orange) for a tasteful pop of whimsy in your home. Bulb type: E26 LED bulb recommended Light bulb included? No Light Bulbs: Can I use a higher wattage bulb than recommended?While you can use a higher watt light bulb than your light fixture suggests, we wouldn‚Äôt recommend it. Wattage relates to how much power a particular device uses, and if more than the design allows is being used, you face the risk of ‚Äòoverlamping,‚Äô meaning your fixture will start to run particularly hot. This is bad for a few reasons: Overheating can melt bulb sockets and wiring and, in the worst cases, lead to an electrical fire. It may also cost you more in the long run and be less energy-efficient‚Äîif your bulbs are drawing too much energy, it‚Äôll likely mean having to replace them more frequently. If you‚Äôre still confused on the correct bulb to look for, we hope this handy visual guide will help.How We TestedThere are many factors we considered for each of our reviews to give you the insight you need to select the best table lamps for your home, namely the following:
html:
(Lamps pictured with a 2.4-ounce candle for size comparison)

Our Top Picks

  • Best Mid-Century Table Lamp: Article Moon Gold Table Lamp, $149 from Article
  • Best Statement Lamp: Urban Outfitters Strawberry Table Lamp, $64 from Urban Outfitters
  • Best Coastal Chic Lamp: Serena & Lily Como Petite Table Lamp, $298 from Serena & Lily
  • Best Glass Lamp: West Elm Ribbed Glass Table Lamp, $99 from West Elm
  • Best Portable Lamp: Flowerpot V9 Rechargeable LED Table Lamp, $315 from Anthropologie
  • Best Small Lamp: Pottery Barn Fallon Forged Iron Table Lamp, $249 Pottery Barn
  • Best Rechargeable Lamp: Flos Bellhop Rechargeable Table Lamp, $319 from DWR
  • Best Cottagecore Lamp: Lulu & Georgia Jordan Table Lamp, $198 from Lulu & Georgia
  • Best Shape: McGee & Co. Vedruna Table Lamp, $349 from McGee & Co.
  • Best Fabric Lamp: Scrunch Black and White Table Lamp by Kara Mann, $179 from CB2
  • Best Task Lamp: Analog Task Lamp, $248 from Gantri

Best Mid-Century Table Lamp: Article Moon Gold Table Lamp

Article Moon Gold Table Lamp

Despite its oversized bulb, this lamp has a small footprint‚Äîperfect for a nightstand that could use some elegance. The base is made of a brushed metal and it has a fabric-wrapped cord, providing the perfect anchor for the frosted glass shade. Contributor Andrea Lewis particularly loved the ‚Äúseamless‚Äù assembly process as well as the ‚Äúsimple, petite, and versatile‚Äù midcentury-modern design. ‚ÄúThe Moon Gold table lamp from Article has become a staple in my bedroom‚Äîits misted glass shade casts a prominent warm light that‚Äôs perfect for reading,‚Äù she says. ‚ÄúWhether you place it on a study desk, beside your bed, or in your living room, this small but powerful lamp radiates generously.‚Äù

  • Dimensions: 11" Height x 6" Diameter
  • Materials: Steel, glass, plastic, textile cord
  • Colors: Gold
  • Power source: Plug-in
  • Bulb type: E26 4W LED, accommodates 25W max recommended
  • Light bulb included? Yes

Any dust build up will be slightly more noticeable with this design, so you may have to be diligent in keeping the glass surface wiped clean.

Best Statement Lamp:Urban Outfitters Orange Table Lamp

(Editor's Note: While the orange lamp Lizzie tested is no longer available, we recommend the equally charming strawberry version as a close substitute).

Urban Outfitters Orange Table Lamp

This juicy lamp reminds us of the brightly colored hard candy you might find at the bottom of your grandma‚Äôs purse. With a playful produce-inspired design that can be set on a base or hung from the ceiling, this charming piece is sure to draw oohs and ahhs from anyone who loves decor you can sink your teeth into.

  • Dimensions: 8.7" Height x 8.7" Diaemeter
  • Materials: Glass, polyresin, fabric cord, iron
  • Colors: Orange
  • Power source: Plug-in, in-line on/off switch
  • Bulb type: E12 Standard Base 7W Bulb recommended
  • Light bulb included? No

According to Urban Outfitters, this lamp can be used in two ways: perched on its ring-shaped base (as pictured) or hung as a pendant. While the latter is doable on a functional level, it looks pretty bizarre when suspended from the ceiling, as the faux leaves point straight down.

Best Coastal Chic Lamp: Serena & Lily Como Petite Table Lamp

Serena & Lily Como Petite Table Lamp

Looking for some living room table lighting with a touch of coastal grandma style? Look no further than this rattan lamp from Serena and Lily. With its petite size, the light can fill up empty nooks and crannies while perfectly illuminating them. ‚ÄúWhat immediately caught my eye was how the unique, trendy raffia shade complements the sleek ceramic base beautifully,‚Äù associate visuals editor Shani Kravetz told us. ‚ÄúThe lamp is the perfect size for a desk or kitchen counter, adding a warm, ambient glow and delightful pop of style.‚Äù

  • Dimensions: 13.25" Height x 8.25" Diameter
  • Materials: Ceramic base, hand-glazed with brass hardware; shades in raffia or linen
  • Colors: Base: white, coastal blue, sage, dark honey; Shade: white or raffia (in plain taper, fringe, or scalloped finishes)
  • Power source: Plug-in
  • Bulb type: E26 Type A15 medium base bulb (60W max) recommended
  • Light bulb included? No

The switch requires a substantial turn to activate and may not be the best choice for illuminating a full workspace. If the Raffia Wave shade isn‚Äôt your style, there‚Äôs three other shade options available, along with a range of colored bases.

Best Glass Lamp: West Elm Ribbed Glass Table Lamp

West Elm Ribbed Glass Table Lamp

This design-forward white table lamp (which is inspired by a Japanese lantern) has us doing a double take thanks to its silhouette and subtle texture. According to commerce editor Audrey Lee, ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs something about this little lamp that‚Äôs incredibly soothing.‚Äù With a glass shape that doesn‚Äôt scream ‚Äúlight fixture,‚Äù it‚Äôs the perfect way to add pizzazz to any nightstand or dimly lit corner, especially if you prefer contemporary or postmodern design aesthetics. ‚ÄúThis West Elm light emits a subtle glow in such a beautiful way, and I love that the ribbed design doesn‚Äôt disappear when it‚Äôs turned on,‚Äù says Audrey. ‚ÄúI like to have just this on if I‚Äôm about to turn in for the night but want to watch a show or two to help lull me to sleep‚Äîit‚Äôs just perfect.‚Äù

  • Dimensions: 9" Height x 7.75" Diameter; 13.4" Height x 10" Diameter; 18" Height x 13.5" Diameter
  • Materials: Glass, PVC cord
  • Colors: Champagne, amber
  • Power source: Plug-in, in-line on/off switch
  • Bulb type: 60W incandescent bulb or LED equivalent recommended, 9" size has E12 bulb socket; 13" and 18" sizes have E26 bulb socket.
  • Light bulb included? No

While it‚Äôs definitely not dim, this lamp might be best served as a mood lighting moment rather than a solid light source you‚Äôd want for reading or working.

Best Portable Lamp: &Tradition Flowerpot V9 Rechargeable LED Table Lamp

Flowerpot V9 Rechargeable LED Table Lamp

Not only is the Flowerpot Lamp, designed by Verner Panton, a modern design staple‚Äìit‚Äôs also a portable lamp with endless versatility. Need a little more light during transitional hours? How about an extra glow for your outdoor dining table? Commerce director Rachel Fletcher called the petite light source ‚ÄúBy far one of the cutest things I own.‚Äù Great for emitting ‚Äúa soft, romantic light,‚Äù Rachel loves that it can easily live at her desk or tag along to a backyard hang thanks to the portable design. ‚ÄúI have the bright forest green, which gives me frog on a lily pad vibes every time I look at it, and it comes in lots of other shades including more subdued earth tones and metallics.‚Äù And if you love the look but want something more substantial, it is also available in a pendant style as well as a larger, plugged in version (seen here in podcaster Karen Kilgariff's LA office).

  • Dimensions: 11.5" Height x 9" Diameter
  • Materials: Polycarbonate, steel
  • Colors: Swim blue, cobalt blue, stone blue, tangy pink, vermillion red, dark plum, mustard, signal green, matte black, matte white, matte light grey, grey beige, brass-plated, chrome-plated
  • Power source: Rechargeable battery, micro USB charging cable
  • Bulb type: 3W LED built-in bulb
  • Light bulb included? Yes

This lamp, compared to the portable Bellhop, doesn't have a very long charge (the Flowerpot is said to last 10 hours while the Bellhop estimates 24). It also requires its own charging cord (included) that has to be angled just so, as it's hidden under the base of the lamp, which seems like a slightly annoying design feature.

Best Small Lamp: Pottery Barn Fallon Forged Iron Table Lamp

Pottery Barn Fallon Forged Iron Table Lamp

The rustic iron base and clean white shade makes this Pottery Barn lamp perfect for anyone looking to build a modern space that‚Äôs classic, simple, and vintage-inspired. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs slim enough that it won‚Äôt overwhelm wherever you‚Äôll put it,‚Äù notes Audrey. ‚ÄúYou kind of get the best of both worlds with this little lamp: The textured base gives the piece an unfinished look, but the crisp, linen shade makes it feel pristine and less harsh.‚Äù Easy to style in your office, bedroom, living room, or kitchen, we think this is an especially versatile option if you‚Äôre looking to buy the same lamp to have in multiple areas of your home.

Light Bulbs: Can I use a higher wattage bulb than recommended?

While you can use a higher watt light bulb than your light fixture suggests, we wouldn‚Äôt recommend it. Wattage relates to how much power a particular device uses, and if more than the design allows is being used, you face the risk of ‚Äòoverlamping,‚Äô meaning your fixture will start to run particularly hot. This is bad for a few reasons: Overheating can melt bulb sockets and wiring and, in the worst cases, lead to an electrical fire. It may also cost you more in the long run and be less energy-efficient‚Äîif your bulbs are drawing too much energy, it‚Äôll likely mean having to replace them more frequently. If you‚Äôre still confused on the correct bulb to look for, we hope this handy visual guide will help.
